params.admin: The address to be assigned as the admin of the new policy
params.policyType: The type of policy to create (whitelist or blacklist)

returns.newPolicyId: The ID of the newly created policy

params.accounts: The initial accounts to add to the policy list
params.admin: The address to be assigned as the admin of the new policy
params.policyType: The type of policy to create (whitelist or blacklist)

returns.newPolicyId: The ID of the newly created policy

params.policyId: The ID of the policy to check against
params.user: The address to check authorization for

returns._0: True if the user is authorized, false otherwise

params.policyId: The ID of the blacklist policy to modify
params.restricted: Whether to restrict (true) or unrestrict (false) the account

params.allowed: Whether to allow (true) or disallow (false) the account
params.policyId: The ID of the whitelist policy to modify
The ID of the policy to query

returns.admin: The admin address of the policy
returns.policyType: The type of the policy (whitelist or blacklist)

returns._0: The next policy ID that will be assigned to a newly created policy

params.admin: The new admin address for the policy
params.policyId: The ID of the policy to update

createPolicy(address,uint8).notice: Creates a new transfer policy without initial accounts

createPolicy(address,uint8,address[]).notice: Creates a new transfer policy with initial accounts

isAuthorized(uint64,address).notice: Checks if a user is authorized under a specific policy

modifyPolicyBlacklist(uint64,address,boo.notice: Modifies the blacklist status of an account for a blacklist policy

modifyPolicyWhitelist(uint64,address,boo.notice: Modifies the whitelist status of an account for a whitelist policy

policyData(uint64).notice: Returns the policy data for a given policy ID

policyIdCounter().notice: Returns the current policy ID counter

setPolicyAdmin(uint64,address).notice: Updates the admin address for an existing policy
